channel.title: employees on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in employees on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-03
item.description: Here’s everything Apple could announce at its March 8 ‘Peek performance’ special event (5 minute read) Apple will hold its ‘Peek Performance’ virtual event on March 8.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-13
item.description: Microsoft Teams’ Walkie Talkie feature now available to everyone (2 minute read) Walkie-Talkie, a feature that lets Microsoft Teams users turn their mobile and tablet devices into a walkie-talkie that works over cellular data or Wi-Fi, is now available for all users.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-02
item.description: DoorDash isn’t just delivering meals—it’s making them, too (3 minute read) DoorDash is opening a temporary kitchen to make meals for six restaurants in San Jose, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-16
item.description: Square to Create a New Bitcoin Platform for Financial Services (1 minute read) Square is building an open developer platform to make it easier to provide non-custodial, decentralized financial services.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-04
item.description: Samsung officially confirms Galaxy S21 event for January 14th (1 minute read) Samsung will announce its latest lineup of Galaxy flagship phones on January 14th.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-28
item.description: Tesla’s new Boombox feature will let car owners fart at unsuspecting neighbors (2 minute read) Tesla has rolled out its 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-18
item.description: Coinbase files to go public confidentially and we’re hyped (2 minute read) Coinbase has filed to go public, likely debuting in early 2021.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-23
item.description: Charli D’Amelio hits 100 million TikTok followers (3 minute read) Charli D’Amelio has reached 100 million followers on TikTok.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-11
item.description: SpaceX reveals plans for a Texas spaceport resort in new job ad (2 minute read) SpaceX has posted a job for a ‘Resort Development Manager’ to be based out of Brownsville, a town near its Boca Chica test and development site.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-28
item.description: Google will keep employees working remotely until July 2021 (1 minute read) Google will keep its 200,000 full-time and contract employees working remotely until at least July 2021.
